name: magic puzzle 15 slider
description:
four different sliding puzzles, puzzle-15 style with many levels.

Enjoy an exciting experience with this easy and addictive game.

Just enjoy many hours of fun and relaxation in solving puzzles.

designed for puzzle lovers around the world, enjoy solving different puzzles with many difficulty levels.

"puzzle-15" style, solve number puzzles, solve really challenging puzzles where the whole row or column moves, and the new puzzle where you mix the pieces and fix the correct ones.

assemble puzzles of beautiful images of animals, dogs, cats, elephants, lions, tigers, birds, landscapes, insects, pets, wild animals, numbers, and much more...

choose between 4 different players, to be able to compete with your friend or family member.

and let's see who solves more puzzles.

Simple and relaxing, you can't miss it!

Accept the challenge and solve all the levels.
